data.title: Cartoonverse World
data.meta_description: Cartoonverse World is a brand of programming blocks for the formation of weekly lines from 2 to 12 hours produced in 1997 to 2009 in North America and Latin America. It airs on NBC, USA Network, Boomerang and Cartoon Network from September 17, 1997 to February 13, 2009, when Shuriken School...
data.text:
Cartoonverse World is a brand of programming blocks for the formation of weekly lines from 2 to 12 hours produced in 1997 to 2009 in North America and Latin America. It airs on NBC, USA Network, Boomerang and Cartoon Network from September 17, 1997 to February 13, 2009, when Shuriken School ended and was completed by Baby Jake as a new series from a Turner children's channel. Line-ups include Play Date TV, Totally D'Fun, Splashinis Entertainment, Spacethron and Smartoonz/Smartkidz.
